title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 221: Featuring Bryan Berard
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL defenseman Bryan Berard. Beast joins to talk about his career, playing for Mike Milbury, losing his vision in one of his eyes and a ton more. The guys also talk some NHL news, including Cale Makar, Ottawa Senators, the Flames and more. Rear Admiral wraps up with some movie talk and a Gambling Corner.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
